Bash("C:/Users/centu/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python312/python.exe" -c "
import imaplib

email_addr = ''qasimzain127@gmail.com''
app_password = ''ohmgknckitjdeuvn''

try:
    mail = imaplib.IMAP4_SSL\(''imap.gmail.com''\)
    mail.login\(email_addr, app_password\)
    mail.select\(''INBOX'', readonly=True\)
    
    status, data = mail.status\(''INBOX'', ''\(MESSAGES UNSEEN\)''\)
    print\(f''Connection: SUCCESS''\)
    print\(f''Inbox status: {data[0].decode\(\)}''\)
    
    # Count recent emails
    from datetime import datetime, timedelta
    since = \(datetime.now\(\) - timedelta\(days=7\)\).strftime\(''%d-%b-%Y''\)
    status, ids = mail.search\(None, f''\(SINCE ""{since}""\)''\)
    count = len\(ids[0].split\(\)\) if ids[0] else 0
    print\(f''Emails in last 7 days: {count}''\)
    
    mail.logout\(\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''FAILED: {e}''\)
")
